name: Blocks Breakout
description:
A simple retelling of the classic game Breakout, a hit in the arcades and Atari in the 1970s.

An excellent game, simple and inviting for all ages, giving you hours of fun.

Play various levels, with a gradual increase in difficulty and have power-ups that help you or make the gameplay more interesting.

Features:

- Multiple levels;

- Difficulty levels (Easy, Normal and Difficult);

- Power-ups;

- Dynamic speed (according to your performance);

- Background music and impact sound on the blocks (can be disabled);

- List of the highest record by level of difficulty.

- Available in four languages (Portuguese, English, Spanish and French).

Have fun with this game.
